translation: Hello, everyone!
transcript: 大家好！

translation: I am Luan Shuai, a product manager from Baidu DuerOS division.
transcript: 我是来自百度度秘事业部的产品经理栾帅。

translation: Today I'm going to bring you the DuerOS Open Platform Lightweight Device Solution Access Guide course.
transcript: 今天将由我为大家带来Duer OS开放平台轻量级设备方案接入指南的课程。

translation: Hello, DuerOS developers!
transcript: 各位Duer OS开发者朋友大家好！

translation: Here I will introduce the usage process of DuerOS lightweight device access scheme.
transcript: 下面为大家介绍一下Duer OS轻量级设备接入方案的使用流程。

translation: DuerOS provides developers with lightweight device access solutions.
transcript: Duer OS为开发者提供轻量级设备接入的方案。

translation: You can use our partner modules, partner chips or development kits to quickly add the powerful voice interaction capabilities of DuerOS to your lightweight devices.
transcript: 您可以使用我们的合作模组、合作芯片或开发套件来迅速为您的轻量级设备添加Duer OS强大的语音交互能力。

translation: These capabilities include command control, information query, knowledge application, address navigation, life services, calendar reminders, chat entertainment and other more categories.
transcript: 这些能力包含指令控制、信息查询、知识应用、寻址导航、生活服务、日程提醒、聊天娱乐等丰富类目。

translation: And they are now available to DuerOS developers for free.
transcript: 目前已经向Duer OS开放平台的开发者们免费开放。

translation: With the lightweight device solution.
transcript: 而通过轻量级设备方案。

translation: You can quickly and easily integrate configuration and manage DuerOS products.
transcript: 您可以迅速便捷地集成配置和管理Duer OS产品。

translation: Next, let's take a look at the specific process.
transcript: 我们来看一下具体流程。

translation: The figure below shows the cycle of individual product development.
transcript: 下图为单个产品研发的周期。

translation: The product development stage refers that developers register and configure product information through the platform.
transcript: 产品研发阶段是指开发者通过平台注册和配置产品信息。

translation: And complete the integration of the DuerOS SDK on the device side.
transcript: 并在设备端完成Duer OS SDK的集成。

translation: At this point, the product can be connected to the cloud to obtain the voice interaction ability of the DuerOS.
transcript: 此时产品可以与云端相连，获得Duer OS的语音交互能力。

translation: So as to prepare for product demonstrations or formal mass production.
transcript: 为产品演示或正式量产做好准备。

translation: The platform also provides OTA, running log, application configuration, statistical analysis, DuerOS service customization and other functions.
transcript: 平台同时提供了OTA、运行日志、应用配置、统计分析以及Duer OS服务定制化等功能。

translation: Which you can use at all stages of product development or launch.
transcript: 您可以在产品研发或产品上线后的各个阶段使用这些服务。

translation: If the developer's product needs to cooperate with the corresponding APP.
transcript: 如果开发者的产品需要对应的APP配合。

translation: The platform also provides Android SDK and open API for controlling and managing the device.
transcript: 平台还提供了可以控制和管理设备的安卓 SDK 、open API。

translation: And demo APP for early debugging and demonstration.
transcript: 以及供您前期调试和演示使用的demo APP。

translation: Next, let's get into the platform
transcript: 下面我们进入平台。

translation: Please use your Baidu account to log in DuerOS open platform.
transcript: 请使用您的百度账号登录Duer OS开放平台。

translation: Apply to be a developer, and complete the developer certification according to the prompts on the page.
transcript: 并申请成为Duer OS开放平台的开发者，根据页面提示完成开发者认证。

translation: Please make sure that the mobile phone number and email address have been bound with the Baidu account before the application for certification.
transcript: 请确保申请认证前已经为百度账号绑定了手机号和邮箱。

translation: So that the platform can be used normally.
transcript: 平台才可以正常使用。

translation: After the certification is submitted.
transcript: 提交认证之后。

translation: We will carefully review your information and give the console permissions to qualified developers.
transcript: 我们会认真审核您的信息，为符合要求的开发者开放控制台权限。

translation: After approval.
transcript: 审核通过后。

translation: We can create a new product on the console by clicking “create product”.
transcript: 我们可以在控制台新建一个产品，点击创建产品。

translation: And we can see the list of all devices supported by the current platform.
transcript: 可以看到目前平台支持的所有设备列表。

translation: The scenarios that lightweight device solutions support include story machines, smart speakers, refrigerators, smart household appliances, lightweight controlled equipment, and wearable devices.
transcript: 其中轻量级设备解决方案可以支持的场景有故事机、音箱、冰箱、智能小家电、轻量受控设备和可穿戴设备。

translation: Choose your device type.
transcript: 选择您的设备类型。

translation: Let's take the story machine as an example.
transcript: 我们以故事机为例。

translation: On the mbed OS platform, input the product name to enter the product console.
transcript: mbed OS平台，输入产品名称即可进入产品控制台。

translation: We provide access wizards for newly created products.
transcript: 我们为新创建的产品提供了接入向导。

translation: First, you need to set data points for the products.
transcript: 首先需要为产品设置数据点。

translation: The product data point is the unified definition of device, cloud, APP and communication data.
transcript: 产品数据点是对设备端、云端、APP端、通信数据的统一定义。

translation: Please set data points for your product based on its features and device attributes.
transcript: 请根据您的产品功能和设备属性为产品设置数据点。

translation: For example, the story machine will be set with several data points such as switch, play, volume and battery to transmit data, while data points such as switch.
transcript: 比如故事机会设置开关、播放、音量、电量等几个数据点来传输数据。

translation: Mode, refrigerator temperature, freezer temperature and so on will be set for the refrigerator.
transcript: 而冰箱则会有开关、模式、冷藏室温度、冷冻室温度等数据点。

translation: There are three types of data points.
transcript: 数据点分为三种。

translation: The control data points refer to the control instructions sent from the cloud to the device, which are readable and writable.
transcript: 控制数据点是指云端向设备发送的控制指令，可读、可写。

translation: Query data points mean that the cloud sends a query request to the device.
transcript: 查询数据点是指云端向设备发送查询请求。

translation: Which is read-only.
transcript: 只读。

translation: Report data points refer to the data reported by the device to the cloud.
transcript: 上报数据点是指设备向云端上报数据。

translation: The platform provides some typical device data point templates for developers to view and select.
transcript: 平台提供了一些典型的设备数据点模板，供开发者查看和选择。

translation: You can also store your own list of data points as a template for use in subsequent products.
transcript: 你也可以将自己的数据点列表存储为模板，供后续的产品使用。

translation: We choose to apply the data point template of the story machine.
transcript: 我们选择应用故事机数据点模板。

translation: After applying the template, we can still add, edit or delete data points according to our needs.
transcript: 应用模板后仍可以根据自己的需求，增加、编辑或删除数据点。

translation: While adding data points, we need to provide following contents.
transcript: 添加数据点时需要提供以下内容。

translation: Does it support voice interaction?
transcript: 是否支持语音交互？

translation: We have prepared the template of voice interaction data points for you according to different devices.
transcript: 我们按照不同的设备为您准备了语音交互数据点的模板。

translation: All the data points in the template have completed semantic parsing, semantic polysemy, control command conversion and other work.
transcript: 模板中的所有数据点已经完成了语义解析、语义泛化、控制命令转化等工作。

translation: So that the complete path of voice control devices can be directly obtained.
transcript: 可以直接获得语音控制设备的完整通路。

translation: Display name.
transcript: 显示名称。

translation: If the current data point is a speech data point, you can select a speech data point in the template.
transcript: 如果当前数据点为语音数据点，可以在模板中选择一个语音数据点。

translation: If the current data point is a non-speech data point, the display name of the data point can be defined as the name presented to the end users.
transcript: 如果当前数据点为非语音数据点，则可以定义数据点的显示名称即呈现给最终用户的名称。

translation: Such as switch, battery, and current time.
transcript: 比如说开关、电量、当前时间。

translation: You can select the data point category as control, query or report data points.
transcript: 数据点类别，选择数据点为控制、查询或上报数据点。

translation: The identification name is the unique identifier of the data point in the developer's namespace.
transcript: 标识名是该数据点在开发者的命名空间中的唯一标识。

translation: Which distinguishes the data point from other data points.
transcript: 这个唯一标识将该数据点与其他数据点区分开。

translation: Data type.
transcript: 数据类型。

translation: Currently, the system supports six data types which are Boolean, integer, double-precision floating point, enumeration, string, and json.
transcript: 目前系统支持六种数据类型，分别是布尔型、整型、双精度浮点型、枚举类型、字符串型和json类型。

translation: Data points of int and double must define a range of variations.
transcript: int和double类型的数据点必须定义一个变化范围。

translation: While enumeration data points must define individual enumeration values.
transcript: 而枚举数据点必须定义各个枚举值。

translation: With user invisible remarks of some ancillary information defined by the developer for that data point.
transcript: 备注是开发者对该数据点定义的一些附属信息，用户不可见。

translation: Next, I will elaborate on the template of voice data points.
transcript: 下面为大家具体介绍一下语音数据点模板。

translation: At present, the platform has supported voice commands of several smart products such as story machine, portable smart speaker, refrigerator, rice cooker and soybean milk machine.
transcript: 目前平台已经支持故事机、便携音箱、冰箱、电饭煲、豆浆机等几款智能产品的语音指令。

translation: You can use voice command templates and add your own personalized data points.
transcript: 您可以使用语音指令模板并添加自己的个性化数据点。

translation: For example, the built-in play data points of the story machine can obtain common voice interaction capabilities such as children's story play resources, system portraits, weather, translation, and encyclopedia.
transcript: 比如说故事机中内置的play数据点可以获得儿童故事播放资源、系统画像、天气、翻译、百科等通用语音交互能力。

translation: However, the play data points in the speaker are integrated with voice interaction capabilities such as universal information, music, audio resources, children's stories, system portraits, weather, and universal information, etc.
transcript: 而音箱中的play数据点是集成了通用信息、音乐、有声资源、儿童故事、系统画像、天气、通用信息等语音交互能力。

translation: For some smart small appliances.
transcript: 一些智能的小家电。

translation: The platform also provides different voice data point templates.
transcript: 平台也提供了不同的语音数据点模板。

translation: Which can be used according to our platform access guide.
transcript: 可以根据我们的平台接入指南来使用。

translation: After the data points of the platform are set up, the data point test can start.
transcript: 设置好平台的数据点之后即可展开数据点测试。

translation: Before completing device-side development.
transcript: 在完成设备端开发之前。

translation: We need to get certain and valid product data points.
transcript: 需要得到确定且有效的产品数据点。

translation: To facilitate quick verification by developers, we have generated a virtual device for each product.
transcript: 为方便开发者快速验证，我们为每个产品生成了一个虚拟设备。

translation: Developers can use demo APP provided by the platform to control this virtual device and quickly verify the effect of data point definitions.
transcript: 开发者可以使用平台提供的demo APP控制这个虚拟设备，快速验证数据点定义的效果。

translation: Which greatly speeds up development and reduces the complex workload of device-side development.
transcript: 从而极大地加快开发速度，减少设备端开发的复杂工作量。

translation: Click “Start Virtual Device”.
transcript: 点击启动虚拟设备。

translation: Obtain the demo APP of the platform via the download link and then install it on Android mobile phones.
transcript: 可以通过下载链接获得平台的demo APP并安装到安卓手机中。

translation: Log in the APP with Baidu account.
transcript: 在APP上使用百度账号登录。

translation: Scan the QR code here and bind the virtual device.
transcript: 扫描此处的二维码，绑定该虚拟设备。

translation: Then you can see the data point control interface of the virtual device on the demo APP.
transcript: 即可在demo APP上看到虚拟设备的数据点控制界面，

translation: All operations will be displayed in the form of log here.
transcript: 所有的操作将会在此处以日志的形式展现。

translation: After completing the data point test, you can proceed to the next device development.
transcript: 完成数据点测试之后可以进入下一步设备端开发。

translation: This page prepares the development resources of the device side, including the software development package.
transcript: 这个页面准备了设备端的开发资源，包含软件开发包。

translation: Which is the device-side SDK and other resources required for device-side development.
transcript: 即完成设备端开发所需要的设备端SDK及其他资源。

translation: A Profile is an identity file for single device and contains basic information such as the device ID.
transcript: Profile是单个设备的标识文件，含有设备ID等基本信息。

translation: In the debugging stage, the platform provides 20 initial profiles for collaborative development.
transcript: 在调试阶段，平台提供20个初始的profile用于协同开发。

translation: The device description file is a code file automatically generated based on device data points.
transcript: 设备描述文件是根据设备数据点自动生成的代码文件。

translation: And is convenient for developers to complete the function development of the data points according to the specified format.
transcript: 方便开发者按照规定格式完成数据点的功能开发。

translation: For device-side development, please refer to the device-side development manual or the device-side development tutorial provided by the platform.
transcript: 设备端开发请参考平台提供的设备端开发手册或设备端开发教程。

translation: Click “Finish” to exit the wizard.
transcript: 点击“完成”退出向导。

translation: You can also skip the wizard at any time and complete the above three steps on the production console.
transcript: 你也可以随时跳出向导，在产品控制台中完成以上三个步骤。

translation: On the product console.
transcript: 产品控制台中。

translation: Developers can edit their own product names and view the DuerOS’ APP ID, APP Key, Baidu voice AK and SK.
transcript: 开发者可以编辑自己的产品名称，查看Duer OS的APP ID、APP Key和百度语音AK、SK。

translation: In the custom configuration, you can add some fields and write them together in the profile for developers to select according to their requirements.
transcript: 在自定义配置中可以增加一些字段，共同写到profile中去，开发者可以根据需求选择使用。

translation: After the developer has compiled, connected, and burned the firmware to the physical device.
transcript: 开发者完成了固件的编译、连接并烧录到实体设备后。

translation: The physical equipment can be verified by the demo APP.
transcript: 就可以通过demo APP来对实体设备进行验证了。

translation: In the right control device and data query sections.
transcript: 在右侧的控制设备及数据查询部分。

translation: Find the device configuration file stored in the physical device in the drop-down list.
transcript: 在下拉列表中找到存入实体设备中的设备配置文件。

translation: Which is the profile.
transcript: 也就是profile。

translation: The platform generates the QR code of the device according to the profile.
transcript: 平台会根据profile生成设备的二维码。

translation: In the demo APP, the device can be scanned and bound and controlled.
transcript: 在demo APP中可以扫描绑定和控制设备。

translation: The verification method is the same as that of the virtual device.
transcript: 验证方法和虚拟设备相同。

translation: Devices that have completed device-side development can apply for batches through the mass production interface.
transcript: 完成设备端开发的设备可以通过批量生产界面申请批次。

translation: And the developer can manage the batches according to the production time and software version of the device.
transcript: 开发者可以根据设备的生产时间和软件版本来管理批次。

translation: Currently, the platform limits the production of the device up to 20 per batch, and a total of 10 batches can be applied.
transcript: 目前平台限制了每个批次最多生产20个设备，一共可以申请十个批次。

translation: If you have higher requirements, please contact the open platform of DuerOS.
transcript: 如果您有更高的需求，请与Duer OS开放平台联系。

translation: Click on the Create Batch Case in the upper right corner to fill in the number of production equipment for the batch.
transcript: 点击右上角的创建批次案件，填写该批次的生产设备数量。

translation: After the successful creation, you can directly download the profile of all the equipment of the batch in the batch list!
transcript: 创建成功后可以直接在批次列表中下载该批次所有设备的profile！

translation: OTA upgrade is a relatively efficient firmware upgrade method at present.
transcript: OTA升级是目前较为高效的固件升级方式。

translation: Developers can conduct OTA management on devices here.
transcript: 开发者可以在这里对设备进行OTA管理。

translation: OTA upgrade function has been strictly checked to ensure that your device will not be tampered or upgraded by others.
transcript: OTA升级功能已经进行了严格的安全性检查，确保您的设备不会被其他人篡改和升级。

translation: Click the "add" button.
transcript: 点击“添加”按键。

translation: Fill in the version information of the device.
transcript: 填写设备的版本信息。

translation: And upload the firmware file of the target version.
transcript: 并上传目标版本的固件文件。

translation: Please complete the verification of the file before uploading the firmware file to ensure that the firmware package can run normally.
transcript: 请在上传固件文件前完成对该文件的验证，确保该固件包可以正常运行。

translation: In order to ensure the security of firmware files pushed on batch devices.
transcript: 为了保证固件文件在批量设备上推送的安全性。

translation: The platform provides the verification function of firmware files.
transcript: 平台提供了固件文件的验证功能。

translation: Only approved firmware versions can issue OTA instructions to bulk online devices.
transcript: 只有通过验证的固件版本才可以向批量的线上设备下发OTA指令。

translation: Click "Verify Now" to use the device verification function.
transcript: 点击“立即验证”进入设备验证功能。

translation: Input the device ID and click Verify.
transcript: 输入设备ID并点击验证。

translation: The platform will push the current firmware file to the device.
transcript: 平台会将当前的固件文件向该设备推送。

translation: You can view the device push status in the list, and successfully pushed devices are manually verified by the developer.
transcript: 您可以在列表中查看设备推送状态，推送成功的设备由开发者进行手动验证。

translation: If the device runs as expected.
transcript: 如果设备运转符合预期。

translation: Click "Verification Pass" to indicate that the device has successfully completed the OTA.
transcript: 则可以点击“验证通过”，表示该设备已经成功进行了OTA。

translation: If there is an error, please click "Verification Fail".
transcript: 如果出现错误，请点击“验证失败”。

translation: If so, the OTA fails.
transcript: 本次OTA失败。

translation: When any device passes the verification of the current version of the OTA process.
transcript: 当有任何一个设备验证通过了当前版本的OTA流程。

translation: The firmware package is validated and can be distributed to more devices.
transcript: 则该固件包通过验证，可以下发到更多的设备中。

translation: However, we strongly recommend you to verify each to-be-upgraded firmware version once before distributing them.
transcript: 但我们强烈建议对每一个将升级的固件版本都做一次验证，再对整体下发。

translation: The verified firmware package can be released to the factory device to manage the OTA through a publishing policy.
transcript: 已经通过验证的固件包可以向出厂设备发布，通过发布策略来管理OTA。

translation: Click "Add Policy" for the current firmware to add a release strategy.
transcript: 点击“添加策略”为当前固件添加一条发布策略。

translation: Each strategy can be configured with the following information.
transcript: 每条策略可以配置以下的信息。

translation: Including upgrade with no notification which means that the equipment will be upgraded with no reminder or user intervention.
transcript: 升级方式包含无通知升级，也就是直接对设备升级，没有提醒，无需用户干预。

translation: And upgrade with user confirmation which means the upgrade information will be pushed to the cloud for the developers to set user validation rules.
transcript: 或者用户确认升级，会将升级消息推送到云端，开发者可以自行设置用户确认规则。

translation: The validity of release means that the release is valid within the date range and invalid on other dates.
transcript: 发布有效期是指发布在该日期区间内有效，其他日期策略失效。

translation: The release period means that the release is valid during this time period of a day and invalid otherwise.
transcript: 发布时段是指该发布在每日这个时间段的有效，其他时间段内策略失效。

translation: Developers can schedule releases based on their users' habits.
transcript: 开发者可以根据自己用户使用习惯来规定发布时段。

translation: Filtering old version.
transcript: 旧版本筛选。

translation: Developers can only update devices in the filtering old versions.
transcript: 开发者可以只更新旧版本筛选范围内的设备。

translation: And multiple selections of firmware versions are also supported.
transcript: 支持固件版本多选。

translation: Batch screening.
transcript: 批次筛选。

translation: Developers can only update devices within the batch screening range, and multiple selections of batches are also supported.
transcript: 开发者可以只更新批次筛选范围内的设备，也支持批次多选。

translation: Devices that belong to both ranges are the ones that the upgrade strategy covers this time.
transcript: 以上所有的值取交集是本次更新策略覆盖的设备。

translation: After the policy is successfully added, the policy appears in the list.
transcript: 添加策略成功后可以看出策略出现在列表中。

translation: It supports adding multiple policies, and starting or pausing at any time.
transcript: 支持添加多个策略，并可随时开始和暂停。

translation: You can also use this section of the interface to query the upgrade status of the device based on the device ID.
transcript: 您也可以通过界面的这个部分来根据设备ID查询该设备的升级情况。

translation: Enter the device ID and click "Query".
transcript: 输入设备ID点击“查询”即可。

translation: The running logs of all physical devices can be viewed in the running log page.
transcript: 所有实体设备的运行日志都可以在运行日志页面中查看到。

translation: The developer can retrieve the running status of a single device according to the device ID and obtain all the logging information of the device through the "View" button on the right side of the running log.
transcript: 开发者可以按照设备ID来检索单个设备的运行情况，通过右侧的运行日志“查看”按键来获取设备的所有日志信息。

translation: All the control logs of the device will be displayed in the initial state.
transcript: 初始状态下会展示设备所有的控制日志。

translation: And the reporting log of all devices can be viewed through the header switch.
transcript: 可以通过表头切换查看到所有设备的上报日志。

translation: With the application configuration function, developers can manage their individual applications.
transcript: 在应用配置功能中，开发者可以管理自己的各个应用。

translation: After the application is associated with the product, it can interact with the data points of all hardware devices connected with the product.
transcript: 应用和产品关联之后就可以和该产品下所有的硬件设备进行数据点的交互操作。

translation: If you want to create a new application.
transcript: 如果想要创建一个新的应用。

translation: You can click "Create Application" in the upper right corner.
transcript: 可以点击右上角的创建应用按键。

translation: And then enter an application name.
transcript: 然后输入一个应用名称。

translation: After clicking OK.
transcript: 点击确定后。

translation: The system will assign an ID and a Key to the newly created application.
transcript: 系统会为新创建的应用分配一个ID和Key。

translation: This ID and the Key are used to give an application permission to manipulate data points.
transcript: 这个ID和Key是用来赋予一个应用操作数据点的权限的。

translation: Only applications that have the ID and the Key configured correctly can operate the data points.
transcript: 只有正确配置了ID和Key的应用才能够操作数据点。

translation: At present, the platform has provided Android SDK and Open API.
transcript: 目前平台提供了安卓SDK和Open API。

translation: Developers need to fill in corresponding information to use them properly.
transcript: 开发者需要填写相应的信息才能正确地使用。

translation: After filling, you can follow the Android SDK documentation or the Open API documentation to complete the APP development of the control device.
transcript: 填写完成后可以按照安卓SDK文档或Open API文档来完成控制设备的APP的开发。

translation: Application binding means that the developer can bind or unbind the current product in the list.
transcript: 应用绑定是指开发者可以在列表中将应用于当前产品绑定或解绑。

translation: Only the application bound to the product can control all the devices connected with the product.
transcript: 只有与产品绑定的应用才可以控制该产品下所有的设备。

translation: The data statistics function provides manufacturers and developers with multi-angle data statistics on the platform  to understand the operation of their equipment.
transcript: 数据统计功能是平台提供了多角度的数据统计信息，供厂商和开发者了解自己的设备运转情况。

translation: The platform provides the ability to customize voice interaction content and DuerOS services.
transcript: 平台提供了自定义语音交互内容和Duer OS服务的能力。

translation: Which can be turned on or off by developers on DuerOS service customization page.
transcript: 开发者可以在Duer OS服务定制化页面开启或关闭相关服务。

translation: These services include system portraits, encyclopedia question and answer, weather, entertainment, voice control devices, chat, and more.
transcript: 这些服务包含了系统画像、百科问答、天气、娱乐、语音控制设备、聊天等。

translation: Users can also customize the System Portrait Service.
transcript: 对系统画像服务用户还可以进行自定义。

translation: Click on the system portrait.
transcript: 点击系统画像。

translation: Edit it.
transcript: 编辑。

translation: And you can see a list of system portraits on the new page.
transcript: 并在新页面中看到系统画像列表。

translation: You can enable or disable a system portrait and edit your own words.
transcript: 您可以启用或停用一条系统画像并编辑自己的话术。

translation: That’s all about today's course.
transcript: 今天的课程内容就为大家介绍这些。

translation: If you want to know more about it.
transcript: 如果大家有更多想要了解的内容。

translation: Please log in to the DuerOS open platform and give us real-time feedback.
transcript: 欢迎登录Duer OS开放平台实时反馈信息给我们。

translation: Thank you all!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
